Big red diamond shaped gem used in MAP06: Bright Crucible. It is required for finishing a puzzle where you put it on a [[Classes:ZGemPedestal|pedestal]], needed for finishing the level.
Note the name "Heart of D'Sparil", which is a reference to the first of the Serpent Riders, who appears in Heretic. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PuzzGemBig : {{Class|PuzzleItem}} { {{Property|PuzzleItem.Number}} 1 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} ARTIBGEM {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ARTIPUZZGEMBIG" // "HEART OF D'SPARIL" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_ARTIPUZZGEMBIG" States { Spawn: ABGM A -1 Stop } }
